active.description: Sets the step as active. Is passed to child components.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

completed.description: Mark the step as completed. Is passed to child components.

disabled.description:
Mark the step as disabled, will also disable the button if
`StepButton` is a child of `Step`. Is passed to child components.

index.description:
The position of the step.
The prop defaults to the value inherited from the parent Stepper component.

last.description:
If `true`, the Step is displayed as rendered last.
The prop defaults to the value inherited from the parent Stepper component.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.horizontal: Styles applied to the root element if `orientation="horizontal"`.
descriptions.vertical: Styles applied to the root element if `orientation="vertical"`.
descriptions.alternativeLabel: Styles applied to the root element if `alternativeLabel={true}`.
descriptions.completed: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `completed={true}`.
